title: Meat Day!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Yoshiko! It’s Meat Day! Lanzhu brought some meat!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>What are you doing here!? Also, it’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Since it’s Meat Day, Lanzhu thought it’d be nice to eat some meat with you. Lanzhu had roast beef with Ruby on Good Meat Day, so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eeeh!? No fair! That must’ve been so nice.... Ah, I mean, forget that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu brought a meat dish that Lanzhu thought you would like, Yoshiko. Here, look!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>W-, what is this....? It has a really peculiar smell....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>It’s a famous stew from my country. It’s made with Huixiang, Shanzha, Bajiao, Guipi, Gancao, and Liangjiang.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh.... What are those cool names!? They sound like herbs used by witches!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>So, you’re interested, right, Yoshiko?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kukuku.... It can’t be helped. There’s no way I wouldn’t accept an offering from a little demon.... Come on, let’s eat it together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
